title: Create BossManager.js
description:
Manager class to handle boss spawning and fight state.

**File:** src/systems/BossManager.js

**Responsibilities:**
- Track boss spawn timer
- Spawn boss when timer reaches threshold
- Pause regular enemy spawning during boss fight
- Resume spawning after boss defeated
- Handle boss rewards on death

**Properties:**
- scene reference
- currentBoss (null or Boss instance)
- bossSpawnTimer
- isBossFight (boolean)

**Methods:**
- constructor(scene)
- update(delta) - timer logic, spawn check
- spawnBoss() - create boss, pause spawner, emit event
- onBossDefeated() - rewards, resume spawner, reset timer
- isBossActive() - returns boolean

**Integration points:**
- Called from GameScene.update()
- Pauses EnemySpawner.update() during fight
- Triggers UIManager for boss health bar

**Acceptance:**
- Boss spawns after configured interval
- Regular spawning stops during fight
- Spawning resumes after boss death
close_reason: Closed

title: Boss System
description:
Implement the Doomstar boss with multi-phase combat.

## Design Summary
- **Spawn Trigger:** Timer-based (every N minutes via DifficultyManager)
- **Movement:** Anchored near top of screen, side-to-side
- **3 Phases:**
  - Phase 1 (100-66% HP): Spray pattern + light aimed shots
  - Phase 2 (66-33% HP): Aimed shots + summons fighters
  - Phase 3 (33-0% HP): All attacks faster + summons heavies
- **During Fight:** Regular spawning stops; boss summons minions
- **Rewards:** 5000 points + extra life + guaranteed power-up

## Assets Ready
- 16 sprite frames in public/assets/Boss/
- Animations: idle, move, attack, damaged, death
close_reason: Closed

title: Create Boss.js sprite class
description:

**Class structure:**
- Extends Phaser.Physics.Arcade.Sprite
- Properties: health, maxHealth, phase, bulletGroup
- Movement: side-to-side at top of screen (sine wave or patrol)
- Phase detection: check health thresholds, trigger phase transitions

**Methods:**
- constructor(scene, x, y)
- preUpdate(time, delta) - movement, attack timing, phase checks
- takeDamage(amount) - health reduction, phase transition, damage flash
- getCurrentPhase() - returns 1, 2, or 3
- onPhaseChange(newPhase) - visual/audio feedback
- die() - death animation, rewards

**Animations to register:**
- boss_idle (frames 01-03, loop)
- boss_move_left (frame 01)
- boss_move_right (frame 03)
- boss_attack (frames 01-04, no loop)
- boss_damaged (frames 01-03, no loop)
- boss_death (frames 01-04, no loop)

**Acceptance:**

- Takes damage, shows damage animation
- Transitions through 3 phases
- Plays death animation when killed

title: Integrate boss into GameScene
description:
Wire up BossManager and boss functionality in GameScene.

**Changes to GameScene.js:**

1. Import and instantiate BossManager
2. Call bossManager.update() in update loop
3. Pass boss to CollisionManager when spawned
4. Handle boss defeat event (extra life, score, power-up drop)

**Changes to DifficultyManager.js:**
- Add method to check if boss should spawn based on difficulty level
- Or: BossManager handles its own timer independently

**Event flow:**
1. BossManager.spawnBoss() creates boss, emits 'bossSpawned'
2. GameScene listens, pauses enemySpawner
3. Boss.die() emits 'bossDefeated'
4. GameScene listens, gives rewards, resumes spawner

**Acceptance:**
- Boss spawns during gameplay
- Fight plays out with all mechanics
- Rewards given on boss death
- Game continues normally after
